thread.title: Ground News - Israeli High Court unanimously rules in favor of same-sex adoption
thread.title_full: Ground News - Israeli High Court unanimously rules in favor of same-sex adoption

author: Ground AI
title: Ground News - Israeli High Court unanimously rules in favor of same-sex adoption
text:
Left Center Right
Bias Insights
Bias Insights Israel 's High Court of Justice ruled that same-sex couples can adopt children, following a petition arguing for interpretation of the Adoption Law. LGBT Task Force director-general, Ran Shalhavi, called the ruling a historic victory, providing hope during difficult times. The Supreme Court's decision is seen as a step towards equality and protection of rights for same-sex couples in Israel.
Insights by Ground AI
